title: 7(4) of the Gender Pay Gap Information Act 2021 (No. 20 of 2021), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gender Pay Gap Information Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gender Pay Gap Information Act 2021 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gender pay gap information act 2021 (commencement) order 2022

title: 7(4) of the Gender Pay Gap Information Act 2021 (No. 20 of 2021), hereby
heading: 2. The 31st day of May 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Gender
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of May 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Gender 

Pay Gap Information Act 2021 (No. 20 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 May, 2022. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd June, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [263] 3
